segments.text: Ugh, the sink is just wasting water like that, pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddleâ€”how gross, she must feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids rummaging in the cookie jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's filthy from the floor, and he's climbing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets looks so unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, probably sticky from earlier snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole mess is turning the kitchen into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't hide the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying dishes while ignoring the flood? Disappointing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies might get crumbs all over the counter too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of the slipping hazard on wet tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron's probably getting soaked without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just begging for a good cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR
